name: TACO GAME
description:
You decide to start running a taco restaurant to make a little money, so you build one yourself! But as soon as you finish building it, you learn that you built it in an area you dont own. It will take 3 days for the government to find it. Hurry! Make some money!

The game lasts for 3 ingame days

1 ingame day = 2 real time minutes

There are 3 endings
